definition: actually/place/classifier for houses, small buildings, institutions etc/that which/particle introducing a relative clause or passive/CL:個|个[ge4]
catty/(PRC) weight equal to 500 g/(Tw) weight equal to 600 g/(HK, Malaysia, Singapore) slightly over 604 g
place/location/(after a noun) place where it is located
one's affiliation (i.e. the organization one is affiliated with)/subordinate (i.e. those subordinate to oneself)/belonging to/affiliated/under one's command

sentences.english: What were the subtexts of this venerable tale?
sentences.chinese: 这部古老的童话所暗含的意义是什么呢？

sentences.english: All the old lady did was quote a scripture to you.
sentences.chinese: 这位剩女所做的就是念了一段经。

sentences.english: Here is a list of what it will include.
sentences.chinese: 以下是它所能够包含的新特性列表。

sentences.english: Everything you have ever known Kratos, will now suffer because of your sacrilege .
sentences.chinese: 你要知道你现在所遭受的一切是来自于你的亵渎。

sentences.english: Nutrition for Foodservice and Culinary Professionals, Study Guide, 6th Edition.
sentences.chinese: 食品服务和厨房专家所需营养，研究指导，第六版。

sentences.english: One of the girls she rescued from a pimp later graduated from high school as valedictorian.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个她所救的女孩之后在高中毕业典礼上致辞。

sentences.english: Moreover, the relatively high proportion of mature or over-mature forests shows that resources in support are insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 近成过熟林所占比例较大，后备资源不足。

sentences.english: The small chin deformity was a common developmental deformity of the jaw.
sentences.chinese: “地包天”牙是颌骨发育畸形或不良习惯所引起。

sentences.english: This approach leads to misalignment between the business goals and the developed services.
sentences.chinese: 这个方法将导致业务目标和所开发的服务间的不一致。

sentences.english: As you can see, there are some consequences with the current arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 正如您所看到的，当前这种安排还存有许多问题。

sentences.english: Most of the scenes are written in verse, but some are in prose.
sentences.chinese: 她所写的诗大部分都是无韵诗。

sentences.english: The bulk of our nutritional needs come from fruits, vegetables, and grains.
sentences.chinese: 我们所需的营养大部分都来自于水果，蔬菜和谷物。

sentences.english: Bellringing is what I'm good at though.
A few empty cysts were surrounded with disorganized stromal collagen fibers.
sentences.chinese: 一些空囊，已由结缔纤维所组织化。

sentences.english: The description of a nominal taxon when it is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立一个命名分类单元时所做的描述。

sentences.english: And so, this actually is the input we needed to justify our criterion.
sentences.chinese: 这实际上是证明准则所需要的。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
its place/one's appointed place/the place for that
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
(used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
